title: Book Chapter: Printing a Sustainable Future
description: Co-authored a chapter in 'Hybrid Metal Additive Manufacturing' on revolutionizing waste management through additive manufacturing. Published by CRC Press in 2023.

title: Organic 3D Filament for 3D Printers
description: Innovated a sustainable method for synthesizing organic 3D filament using food waste, driving advancements in eco-friendly 3D printing. Filed under patent number 202311054420 on Aug 13, 2023.

title: Mycofibre Composite and Synthesis
description: Developed fungal-based mycofibre, an eco-friendly and biodegradable material, offering a sustainable alternative to traditional textiles. Filed under patent number 202311048967 on Jul 20, 2023.

title: AI-Enabled Tracking-Based Security System
description: Designed a cutting-edge AI-powered tracking security system for enhanced safety and surveillance. Issued under patent number 202311054397 on Aug 13, 2023.
